mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, name, nickname, phone, addr1,addr2, zipcode, mailing, sms, password ) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone},#{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode}, #{mailing}, #{sms}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY regidate DESC
mapper.update: update member set enabled='Y' where email=#{email}
